description: Try our easy to follow Stuffed Sweet Potato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Stuffed Sweet Potato Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup reduced-fat semi dried tomato strips

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Halve sweet potatoes lengthwise. Cover with paper towel and microwave (in batches, if necessary) on high for 8-10 minutes or until just tender. Cool slightly, then scoop out flesh from centre leaving a 1cm thick shell. Place on a baking paper-lined baking tray, spray with oil and bake for 12 minutes.
Chop sweet potato flesh and place into a bowl. Add ricotta, olives, tomatoes, spinach and cup of the cheese. Add oil, season and mix well.
Fill sweet potato shells with mixture and sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Serve with salad leaves.
